title: why you don’t believe in at me speaks

replies.msg: I no lie, I love you very, you are sad weep, I weep more than you, I am sad more than because, what is I unknow me does? wrong, can are you tell me please? Me wrong what, before, abandon me goes to, listen am I can explain please? Am I feel pain very know?  I have no the happiness now, at you do with me like this? Tell can am I please? Me wrong what, that love
我沒有說謊，我非常愛你，你傷心哭泣，我比你哭泣更多，我傷心超過，因為，我不知道我在做什麼？錯，你能告訴我嗎？我錯了，以前，放棄我去，聽我能解釋一下嗎？我很痛苦嗎？我現在沒有幸福，你這樣對我嗎？告訴我可以嗎？我錯了，那愛
